Issue.creator: suryalnvs
Issue.summary: Provide ways to find kafka cluster version in upgrade orderers documentation
Issue.description: In the documentation for upgrade orderers ( http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/master/upgrade_to_one_point_one.html#update-orderer-binaries), while adding the ORDERER_KAFKA_VERSION as environment variable, need to provide ways on how to find the kafka cluster version.
